subject: Delivery to Europe
description_text:
Hi,

Do you have warehouse in Europe for GT2 steering wheel & hub or is the
shipment from outside of Europe? How about for Plus X pedals?

BR

Antti

conversations.body_text: Hi Antti L,  The GT2 steering wheel and hub need to be shipped from China. The PlusX will be available for shipping from the German warehouse starting after June 15th.

Thanks for this information. This was very good to know.

Do you have plans to deliver also GT2 wheels from German warehouse later?

Antti


ma 9. kesäk. 2025 klo 11.46 support@simsonn.com
Hi，Antti L， ​We already have plans to ship the GT2 to Europe, and it is expected to arrive in about one month.

Hello

Do you already have the GT2 wheel / wheel hub in Europe warehouse? Your
website is unclear that from where the products are delivered. Are you
planning to make some changes to website in near future? I'm interested in
your pedals and wheel hub's but I'm not interested of paying extra taxes. I
live in Finland.

Regards,

Antti

keskiviikko 11. kesäkuuta 2025 support@simsonn.com
